messages.content: STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the limit of the amplification factors of dynamic loading applied to a structure?
Dynamic amplification factors rarely exceed 2.0.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What materials are primarily used as structural materials in spacecraft design?
Due to their characteristics, materials used are glass and ceramics because there is no plastic deformation before fracture.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the critical stress intensity factor (KIC) of the material?
Material property that outlines the combination of stress and defect size that precipitated failure.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the purpose of NPR 7123.1?
It provides a generic description of systems engineering as applied throughout NASA.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What are the common technical processes of NPR 7123.1?
System design, product realization, and technical management.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is Model-Based Systems Engineering (MBSE)?

It is the formalized application of modeling to support system requirements, design, analysis, verification and validation activities starting in the conceptual design phase and continuing throughout development and later phases of the lifecycle.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the relationship between NASA's SE Engine and MBSE?

MBSE supports common SE processes by using system models to capture system of interest definitions and relationships. SE products are generated from system models to implement SE processes and support technical program and project reviews.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What aspects does MBSE have?
The modeling language, modeling methodology, and modeling framework.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the use of the modeling language?
It facilitates the description of the system of interest through graphical constructs.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What are the pillars of SysML® diagrams modeling?
There are 4 pillars: structure, behavior, requirements, and parametric. Each pillar supports common SE activities used to define a system in a model to develop an SE product.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the purpose of each pillar of SysML® diagrams modeling?

The structure pillar supports physical and logical layers, such as systems, subsystems, components, and interfaces. The behavior pillar supports domains like system functionality, system interactions, system response, and system data and information flow. The requirements pillar supports specifications and verification and validation. The parametric pillar supports constraints and mathematical statements. Together, these pillars build a collective context throughout the SysML® model, integrating model elements and diagrams to support the generation of SE products.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the purpose of the MBSE modeling methodology?

It contains a roadmap for consistency and common endpoints in a modeling environment. While modeling languages like SysML® provide enhanced structure and rigor to SE constructs for capturing information in the model, they do not provide step-by-step processes for building a model and supporting data outputs.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What additional steps does the MBSE modeling methodology use compared to NASA's SE Engine?

The model planning and model configuration steps are specific model steps added to complement NPR 7123.1. These additional model-specific steps were leveraged from an INCOSE standard called Object-Oriented Systems Engineering Method (OOSEM).
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the INCOSE standard called Object-Oriented Systems Engineering Method (OOSEM)?

OOSEM is a systems-level development method that combines object-oriented concepts with traditional systems engineering practices. The OOSEM system development workflow shows the steps of the model planning and model configuration in the NASA SE Engine.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What are the equivalents of the 'Specify and design system' steps in the OOSEM workflow in NASA SE Engine?

Model planning, which occurs in technical process 10, called technical planning. Model configuration, which occurs in the system design processes. Interactions and flows from the system design process, showing steps from the NASA SE Manual's system design process.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the purpose of the MBSE modeling framework?
It provides the approach to organize system elements and relationships within the model.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the relationship between the MBSE Modeling Framework and NASA's SE Engine?
This framework leverages MBSE Grid and adapts it to NASA's SE Engine. MBSE Grid represents the project's lifecycle phase in rows and SysML® modeling pillars in columns.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What are the phases of the MBSE Grid project lifecycle?

They are divided into two horizontal sections: the 'problem' defines and provides an understanding of the problem, and the 'solution' provides at least one or more design alternatives to the identified problem.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
How are the phases of the MBSE Grid project lifecycle represented in NASA SE Engine?
The project lifecycle phases in MBSE can be represented by processes 1 to 9 in NASA SE Engine. These processes in NASA SE Engine can represent rows in the grid.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the purpose of the modeling plan?

It is a technical plan that is a subset of the Systems Engineering Management Plan (SEMP). The SEMP documents how NASA's NPR 7123.1 system engineering requirements and practices will be addressed throughout the project/program's lifecycle.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the modeling plan used for?
The modeling plan documents how modeling will support those system engineering requirements and practices throughout the project/program's lifecycle.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
At what stage of the project/program lifecycle is the modeling plan established?

It is established at the beginning of the lifecycle and as the system matures and progresses throughout the lifecycle, the modeling plan should be updated as needed to reflect the current environment and resources.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What are the steps to configure the model?

Model configuration occurs at the beginning of the System Design Processes and involves the following steps:
Modeling conventions include setting naming conventions for model elements and package names.
Modeling standards include establishing standard profiles and other modeling standards based on the project/program needs.
Model organization refers to the package structure and hierarchy configuration to capture the system model.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the purpose of the metamodel?
It represents the system modeling elements and their relationships. The metamodel is used to capture specific SysML language element or type (e.g., requirement, block, activity, refine, derive, etc).
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What are the differences between the MBSE Grid Framework metamodel and the NASA SE-based element and relationship metamodel?

• Explicit traceability of goals and objectives traced from stakeholder needs.
• Addition of structural and behavior elements at the mission level.
• Addition of requirement/validation statements traced back to goals.
• Addition of verification/validation requirement statements traced to technical requirements.
• Refinement of relationships to trace between requirements and behavior elements at the same decomposition level.
• Addition of allocations between requirements and structural pillars.
• Addition of a decomposition relationship to behavior at the component level and top-level structure elements.
• Addition of Measure of Performance (MOP) and Technical Performance Measure (TPM) value property types.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the purpose of the system context?
To describe the scope and boundaries of the system being modeled, including the system of interest, system users, and external system elements that interact with the system of interest.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
How is the system context captured?
Through block definition diagrams (BDDs) and internal block diagrams (IBDs).
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the mission of NESC at NASA?
To conduct testing, analysis, and assessments of NASA's high-risk projects to ensure safety and risk.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
How efficient is the use of Braycote grease in mechanisms?
The use of Braycote grease is very effective because even if it ages, its function and effectiveness do not decrease.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
How is the surface roughness of the sample recommended for determining the ultimate strength of advanced ceramics?
Surface roughness measurements alone may not be suitable for determining the ultimate strength of advanced ceramics.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
Why do pyrotechnic valves often fail?
These valves often fail when activated simultaneously. One solution is to create a system that allows and indicates when each one should be activated.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What types of protection exist for batteries?
There are two levels of protection for batteries: Positive Temperature Coefficient (PTC) and Current Interruption Device (CID).
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What are the purposes of Positive Temperature Coefficient (PTC) and Current Interruption Device (CID)?

PTC protects cells under external conditions, and CID protects cells under overcharge conditions. These processes are effective, but it should be noted that they are only for small-sized batteries and not for larger batteries with higher voltage and size.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the purpose of the Norton-Thevenin Reception Coupling method?
It provides a tool that payload developers can use to obtain launch loads at a fraction of the cost of Coupled Load Analysis (CLA) whenever needed in the payload design cycle.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
How should fracture control of the system be initiated?

Fracture control should be initiated by conducting a structure/system detection review to identify parts/components critical to fracture based on failure modes, consequences of failure, applicable requirements, and experience.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
Why are lithium-ion batteries preferred for aerospace applications?
These batteries are becoming favorites in the aerospace industry due to their high energy capacity.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
How should it be demonstrated that parts critical to fractures are safe?
The demonstration of safe life is based on the initial defect size that could be present in the part. The size of this defect is established through non-destructive evaluation (NDE) or testing.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
How does a standalone oxygen generator work?
It produces breathable oxygen by using chemically reactive briquettes that generate O2.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the purpose of use case diagrams?
To describe the functions of a system and the interactions between those functions and the actors or elements of the system.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is an activity diagram?

It is one of the four diagrams used to describe the behavior of a system. Activities can be captured in activity diagrams that depict the interactions between activities and assignments to structural elements.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
How does toughness relate to strength and ductility?
Toughness tends to decrease with increasing strength and tends to increase with increasing ductility. Both strength and ductility parameters are important and should be considered together.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What should the load spectrum include for safe life assessment?
The load spectrum for the component should include the load level and the number of cycles or duration of each significant load during the hardware's operational lifetime.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
How are interfaces between structural elements captured?
With an Internal Block Diagram (IBD).
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is a requirements table and what is it used for?
It's a tabular format used to represent requirements, their properties, and relationships.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What are satisfaction relationship requirement diagrams used for?
They are used to represent the model elements that satisfy the requirements.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the function of requirement diagrams with verification attributes?
They are used to verify the method using relationships between the requirements and the verification requirements.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What information can be extracted once the system model is configured and populated?

Diagrams and tables can be extracted from the model to visualize, communicate, and deliver data, information, and knowledge to stakeholders; support technical reviews; and enable informed management decisions to advance to the next phase of the lifecycle.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What is the communication channel for issues reported by the program and for what cases is it used?

The channel is the technical member issues that are deemed sufficiently significant to require immediate attention from higher levels of administrative authority can be reported to any technical member.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What does reference analysis provide us?
A continuous review of program factors. Trend analysis has two main characteristics: investigation of actual events and comparative evaluation of multiple events.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What do trend analysis results allow me to do?
Evaluate a program's operations and its component systems by assessing past performance to establish baselines for current and future performance.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY AND RELEVANCE.
What do hardware, software, and firmware types require?
They require the use of NASA's PRACA Constellation data system to report and process issues.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What characterizes Property-Based Requirements (PBR) modeling?
They allow requirements with structure, numerical attributes, and constraints to support requirement analysis.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
How does scenario modeling work?
Scenarios can be used to support ConOps development by adding a scenario modeling context block to serve as a bridge between activities and state machines.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What is an interface metamodel?

It is a representation of the modeling elements of the system and their relationships, showing how functional elements interact with functions and how structural elements interact with other structural elements.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What is the purpose of the logical decomposition process?

It is used to enhance the understanding of the defined technical requirements and the relationships between requirements (e.g., functional, behavioral, performance, and temporal), and to transform the defined set of technical requirements into a set of logical decomposition models and their associated set of derived technical requirements for lower levels of the system and for input to the design solution process.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What would be done if a substituted value is not correct when applying a data mining method?
One option is to use logical methods, where a surrogate feature is found that approximately mimics the performance of the missing feature.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What is the purpose of the stakeholder expectations definition process?
To obtain and define use cases, scenarios, Concept of Operations (ConOps), and stakeholder expectations for the applicable phases of the product lifecycle and the subsequent product.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What does Product Validation involve?

It involves demonstrating that the product achieves its intended purpose according to stakeholder expectations and the Concept of Operations. It can be determined through a combination of testing, analysis, demonstration, and inspection.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What do Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) graphical techniques involve?
They involve plotting raw data, charting simple statistics, and arranging such plots to maximize the natural pattern recognition capabilities, such as using multiple charts per page.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What is ground isolation?

It means that the net DC and AC current, or noise, is substantially reduced (the best isolation being no noise current at all) at the isolated interface. If there is a DC signal ground connection between two sets, and each of them also has an independent chassis ground wire, their signal interfaces are not isolated from each other.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
How to minimize the effects of ground loops?

The closed area around which the current flows should be reduced. Ideally, each signal and power interface circuit would have 100 percent of its current return (at all frequencies) on a dedicated return cable very close to the output signal or power cable.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What does 'star' ground mean?

That all ground cables branch out from the central point of the star. The inductances of long cables and higher frequencies can negate the adequacy of the ground to the point where the assembly no longer has a zero potential reference with respect to the chassis.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What is used during the detailed design phase?
The block diagrams from the Preliminary Design Phase to generate a detailed design based on the requirements and architecture.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What could replace data simulation?
A static timing analysis that calculates the timing of combinational paths between registers and compares it with the designer's timing constraints.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
How is the design implemented on the specific complex electronic device in software?

Implementation typically involves translating the design into source code and compiling it. In complex electronic design, implementation is where the design meets silicon: the top-level design becomes a chip design.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What is the goal of co-design?
To shorten the completion time while reducing design effort and product costs.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
How do standard integrated circuits produced by chip manufacturers differ from Application-Specific Integrated Circuits (ASIC)?
ASICs are designed by the end user and then produced in volume. They also allow the user to combine many parts and functions into a single chip, reducing costs and improving reliability.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
In what different environments can hardware be exposed to dust?
The environments are External Planetary Volumes (PE), Pressurized Planetary Volumes (PP), Space Pressurized Volumes (SP), and Space Internal Volumes (SE).
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
How is a cone of silence formed?
It is formed by all elevation angles greater than the maximum elevation angle reached by the radar.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What are the systems considered undisturbed?

Those in which the initial air uplift is due to topography or local surface heating; therefore, convergence of sea breeze or land breeze, frictional convergence lines, and convection outflow boundaries are not examples of disturbed weather.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
How is the total thickness of cloud layers determined?
Cloud layers are combined with neighboring layers to determine the total thickness only when they are physically connected by vertically continuous clouds or precipitation.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What are special nuclear materials?
They are generally plutonium and enriched uranium.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What should the safety analysis of nuclear flight and Star mission include?

The probability that an accident results in an exposure greater than 5 rem TED for any member of the public; the number of people who could suffer such exposure in the event of an accident; and comparisons of potential exposure levels to other meaningful measures.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What is one of the strategies used by the NASA project manager to facilitate the nuclear launch authorization process?
Provide sufficient resources, access, and participation to conduct nuclear safety analysis and review activities.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What are the characteristics of the OSMA-coordinated negotiated plan of NASA's centers?

The development of a radiological contingency risk posture consistent with the broader principle of using established risk postures to implement a risk leadership philosophy aimed at increasing decision speed.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
How is reliability ensured for launch vehicles?

Modelers often use reliability predictions based on the worst vehicle configurations and mission schedules. Given the nature of Bayesian updating, reliability estimates change constantly as a vehicle or family of vehicles gains additional flight experience.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What attributes are considered for NASA-sponsored launch vehicles?
Attributes studied include flight experience, design assessment, and process-driven elements.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
How should an optimal chassis ground reference system be formed?
Each set must have one and only one path to the chassis (the zero-voltage reference) and there are no deliberate structural currents.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
Is it recommended to use a daisy-chained ground system?

No, it is generally a bad practice since shared return wires cause common mode voltage differences (circuits 'communicate' with each other through common mode impedance coupling). It may be tolerable if done within the bounds of a specific system component like an attitude control subsystem, and the subsystem provides box-to-box wiring. If allowed for separately constructed assemblies that are then integrated, unpredictable behavior can occur.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
Which components should not undergo random vibration testing?
Highly sensitive optics and sensors as they could be damaged by the indicated levels.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
How does the structural element junction work?
They are low-impedance connections of structural elements and other spacecraft-conductive elements that do not deliberately carry electrical currents.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What characterizes a good junction?

A good junction provides a uniform reference plane close to zero volts at all frequencies for electrical system returns. MIL-B-5087B has been the normal bonding standard and is a recommended reference.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
How to prevent floating electronic elements and floating wiring when switch contacts are open?

A static purge resistor (perhaps 5 megohms) can be connected to the chassis in the circuit for any circuit that may float when not coupled to other units or that might be isolated for any reason at any time.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
How to check the isolation of interface circuits?
The simplest way is to use a common ohmmeter, probing the appropriate connector pin, with a junction box or other protective pin device as a means of pin access.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What design feature allows for a single grounding path?

The ground reference of the subsystem's signal point should be routed through a connector pin and then returned to the subsystem and chassis through a bridge on the appropriate connector of this design.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
What aspect is decisive in choosing the required grounding method?

The size and complexity of the spacecraft, however, performance requirements, such as EMC needs of scientific instruments on an otherwise small spacecraft, may dictate the implementation of spacecraft large/complex grounding methods.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
¿Que deberá cumplir las piezas o materiales para el hardware de vuelos espaciales con funciones críticas para la misión?
Deberán estar certificados en cuanto a composición, propiedades y requisitos identificados en el documento de adquisición.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
¿Como conectar a tierra el cable de retorno del sistema de alimentación al chasis?
Esta conexión a tierra generalmente se implementa directamente en el chasis cerca del sistema de distribución acondicionamiento de energía (con un cable/correa corta).
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
¿Que representa la fragilización ambiental del hidrógeno?
La condición en la que los materiales están expuestos a un entorno de hidrógeno gaseoso a alta presión.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
¿Que tipo de resistencia necesita el aislamiento del retorno de energía del chasis?

Necesita una resistencia moderada, por ejemplo, el aislamiento de 2 kiloohmios (kΩ) limita las corrientes del chasis a miliamperios para un sistema de 28 voltios (28 V/2 kΩ equivale a 14 miliamperios y, en el peor de los casos, una pérdida de energía de 0,39 W).
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
¿Que tipo de sistema de puesta a tierra se puede aplicar a una nave espacial grande/compleja?

Se puede utilizar un sistema de tierra flotante equilibrado para la energía primaria (30 V) (Apéndice A). Tanto el cable alto (+) como el de retorno (-) están referenciados al chasis a través de 2 kΩ resistor, un ejemplo de implementación de puesta a tierra de una nave espacial grande/compleja es la sonda Cassini.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
¿Cuales son las fuentes de energía más usuales?
Normalmente se utilizan paneles solares, baterías y otras fuentes de energía.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
¿Que situación especial se presenta con los generadores termoeléctricos de radioisótopos (RTG)?

Su radiación nuclear puede degradar los materiales aislantes dentro del generador (a lo largo de muchos años), provocando cortocircuitos y/o fugas dentro de la carcasa del generador. Por esta razón, los diseñadores de sistemas de energía con RTG deben considerar el aislamiento del cableado de energía (sin conexión a tierra dura de los cables de retorno al chasis de la nave espacial) para reducir los efectos de las fugas en la carcasa del RTG.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
¿Que consideración especial se debe tener en cuenta con el plasma espacial?

Los paneles solares pueden filtrar energía a través de la conductividad del espacio, debido a los iones y electrones en los plasmas espaciales. Cuanto mayor sea el voltaje del panel solar, mayor será la posibilidad de fuga.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
¿Que hacer si se requiere un alto grado de aislamiento entre subsistemas que ya están diseñados y/o construidos?

Se puede utilizar un conjunto complementario (a veces llamado unidad de interfaz remota o RIU) para aceptar las señales del subsistema y aislar en CC los circuitos individuales para el subsistema de interfaz.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
¿Que se recomienda cuando se tiene un sistema de puesta a tierra de la nave espacial totalmente aislado en todas las interfaces?
Se recomienda que todos los circuitos de señal (comando, señal y datos, etc.) estén aislados, ten en cuenta que solo es necesario aislar un extremo de una interfaz (envío o recepción).
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
¿Que se requiere para que un cable sea una tierra real?
Debe ser más corto que 1/20 de una longitud de onda en la frecuencia en cuestión.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
¿Como se deben manejar los circuitos de interfaz que no son de RF dentro de los subsistemas de RF?

Deben aislarse como circuitos de señal de interfaz general para mantener una arquitectura de conexión a tierra aislada. Por lo tanto, los sistemas analógicos y digitales dentro de las unidades de RF deben estar física y eléctricamente separados de las secciones de RF tanto como sea posible (con bobinas de RF, por ejemplo), comenzando con el diseño inicial.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
¿Cual es la mayor amenaza en las unidades de combustión pirotécnica?

La mayor amenaza a la que hay que hacer frente son las llamadas corrientes pirotécnicas. Pueden producirse corrientes del chasis de hasta 20 amperios (A) durante los eventos de disparo pirotécnico. La corriente de falla a tierra es causada por un cortocircuito desde el pin positivo al chasis a través del plasma caliente conductor de la carga de polvo, y continúa como el arco de un soldador de arco. Esto puede ocurrir en el 25 por ciento de los despidos.

¿Cómo se puede promover la protección planetaria de las misiones?

Una categoría de protección planetaria refleja el interés y la preocupación de que la contaminación terrestre pueda comprometer investigaciones futuras, y el grado de preocupación de que el material extraterrestre traído por las naves espaciales que regresan pueda ser perjudicial para la biosfera de la Tierra.
STAR IS AN ASSISTANT WHOSE MAIN OBJECTIVE IS TO ENSURE ACCURACY, CONSISTENCY, AND RELEVANCE.
¿Cómo evitar la contaminación después de un impacto inadvertido?

Las misiones planetarias deben demostrar que se evita la contaminación de cuerpos sensibles del sistema solar por naves espaciales y elementos lanzados durante el sobrevuelo, asistencia por gravedad, inserción orbital u operaciones orbitales utilizando Modelos planetarios actuales aprobados por consenso científico.
